snippet.textDisplay: All I hear is "Dumb Nick, dumb Nick... full reality", sorry to the Nicks out there. Not only was this game amazing, it built detailed backstories for all of its pilots. QQQ was a scrapped robot from the future that was found by the time travelling cop Phoenix. Phoenix restored QQQ and made it his partner, and at some point he went back in time to GX's racing tournament to prevent a criminal from setting in motion a series of catastrophic events. Due to his appearance, it's believed Phoenix is actually related and a successor to Captain Falcon. Oh and probably to ensure that he is allowed in the competition, he artificially reduced his speed which means he actually has the fastest machine. As for QQQ, it's "tortured by the knowledge that some very important data lies somewhere in its AI programming... The truth of the mystery data is this: QQQ was brought from the future by Phoenix and has the necessary navigation hardware needed to traverse time. However if its AI is not repaired (thereby restoring its memory), it will never be able to return to the future." There are 41 pilots in this game.
snippet.textOriginal: All I hear is "Dumb Nick, dumb Nick... full reality", sorry to the Nicks out there. Not only was this game amazing, it built detailed backstories for all of its pilots. QQQ was a scrapped robot from the future that was found by the time travelling cop Phoenix. Phoenix restored QQQ and made it his partner, and at some point he went back in time to GX's racing tournament to prevent a criminal from setting in motion a series of catastrophic events. Due to his appearance, it's believed Phoenix is actually related and a successor to Captain Falcon. Oh and probably to ensure that he is allowed in the competition, he artificially reduced his speed which means he actually has the fastest machine. As for QQQ, it's "tortured by the knowledge that some very important data lies somewhere in its AI programming... The truth of the mystery data is this: QQQ was brought from the future by Phoenix and has the necessary navigation hardware needed to traverse time. However if its AI is not repaired (thereby restoring its memory), it will never be able to return to the future." There are 41 pilots in this game.

snippet.textDisplay: the f-zero series is so unfairly slept on. both X and GX are some of the craziest racing experiences.
snippet.textOriginal: the f-zero series is so unfairly slept on. both X and GX are some of the craziest racing experiences.

snippet.textDisplay: Does this sample Kraftwerk? The low voice sample seems familiar.
snippet.textOriginal: Does this sample Kraftwerk? The low voice sample seems familiar.

snippet.textDisplay: F-Zero had such a playful, fun take on the sci-fi genre. So much potential in the characters and setting, it's criminal Nintendo abandoned the franchise.
snippet.textOriginal: F-Zero had such a playful, fun take on the sci-fi genre. So much potential in the characters and setting, it's criminal Nintendo abandoned the franchise.

snippet.textDisplay: I'm still playing this game on emulator, my favorite racing game
snippet.textOriginal: I'm still playing this game on emulator, my favorite racing game

snippet.textDisplay: Kahoot theme with a side of Ketamine
snippet.textOriginal: Kahoot theme with a side of Ketamine

snippet.textDisplay: Best damn racing game ever made. Star Wars Episode 1 Racer and Diddy Kong racing are my #2 and #3.
snippet.textOriginal: Best damn racing game ever made. Star Wars Episode 1 Racer and Diddy Kong racing are my #2 and #3.

snippet.textDisplay: Simple, but awe inspiring. ^ ^
snippet.textOriginal: Simple, but awe inspiring. ^ ^

snippet.textDisplay: He looks like one of the Pit Droids from Star Wars: Phantom Menace.
snippet.textOriginal: He looks like one of the Pit Droids from Star Wars: Phantom Menace.

snippet.textDisplay: I hate to be such a downer, but I think this may be my least enjoyed track on your long running list :D
snippet.textOriginal: I hate to be such a downer, but I think this may be my least enjoyed track on your long running list :D

snippet.textDisplay: Story makes up for it though! :D
snippet.textOriginal: Story makes up for it though! :D

snippet.textDisplay: I would like nothing more than to take another spin in an F-Zero machine racer just one more time in a new game. Someday.
snippet.textOriginal: I would like nothing more than to take another spin in an F-Zero machine racer just one more time in a new game. Someday.

snippet.textDisplay: Unlocking the AX Pilots in the very hard setting of the story mode chapters is a nasty piece of work, and yet, I find QQQ one of the few "easiest" to get.
snippet.textOriginal: Unlocking the AX Pilots in the very hard setting of the story mode chapters is a nasty piece of work, and yet, I find QQQ one of the few "easiest" to get.

snippet.textDisplay: It's funny that QQQ is one of the easier ones to get, because I consider him to have a sub-par vehicle when compared to some of the other AX racers like PJ
snippet.textOriginal: It's funny that QQQ is one of the easier ones to get, because I consider him to have a sub-par vehicle when compared to some of the other AX racers like PJ

snippet.textDisplay: I remember losing my absolute shit as a kid.
snippet.textOriginal: I remember losing my absolute shit as a kid.

snippet.textDisplay: I've only unlocked a few AX Pilots in the game thus far. Pain in the ass, but very rewarding at the same time. >:)
snippet.textOriginal: I've only unlocked a few AX Pilots in the game thus far. Pain in the ass, but very rewarding at the same time. >:)

snippet.textDisplay: I have the CD for this game. I love the f-zero series, though I’ve mostly played X.

snippet.textDisplay:
It's unfortunate Nintendo doesnt want to make more F-zero games.
Guess they sold terrible in Japan?

snippet.textDisplay: Miyamoto ran out of his stupid ass gimmicks he could hammer and plague the game with. It's either have the series die... or have it become what Starfox is nowadays.
snippet.textOriginal: Miyamoto ran out of his stupid ass gimmicks he could hammer and plague the game with. It's either have the series die... or have it become what Starfox is nowadays.

snippet.textDisplay: Apparently the main reason is "they don't know where to take it next"
snippet.textOriginal: Apparently the main reason is "they don't know where to take it next"

snippet.textDisplay: Neither did they sell well in the West.
snippet.textOriginal: Neither did they sell well in the West.
